title: Integrated Master of Science in Computer Science
description: Graduated in October 2024, with an Integrated Master of Science in Computer Science from NIIT University, Neemrana, Rajasthan, India.

title: Volunteer - Capture and Post Production
description: As a volunteer, I contributed to the Capture and Post Production team for TEDxNIITUniversity, enhancing my skills in video editing and event documentation.

title: Core - Capture and Post Production
description: Successfully conducted the Capture and Post Production team for TEDxNIITUniversity, leading a team of five volunteers.

title: Cyber Security Intern
description: Worked as a Cyber Security Intern as at Rapifuzz, as part of the final semester in the University.

title: UI & Creative Designer
description: Successfully launched Project Alpha, a groundbreaking initiative in machine learning that exceeded all initial performance benchmarks.
